This review identified 13 herbal products - celery, echinacea, ginkgo, ginseng, hydroxycut, kava, kratom, moringa, piperine, rhodiola, St. John’s wort, terminalia/commiphora ayurvedic mixture and valerian – all of which have shown interactions with specific neuropsychiatric drugs.
